mapper.select: SELECT ID ,NAME ,PW ,PH ,PH_CL ,EMAIL ,BLOG ,POST ,AUTHR ,CLSF ,LOG_CNT ,LTST_TM ,get_common(gen) as gen ,BIRTH ,ADDR ,JOIN_DT ,AGE ,API ,NICKNAME ,get_common(clsf) as "clsfname" FROM member ORDER BY join_dt DESC

SELECT reg_dt, ttl, inq_cnt, '스터디모집' as "postType", study_no as "no", id, rprtCnt_r as "rprtCnt", rprtCnt_a as "noneCnt" FROM study s left join ( select notiwr_no, COUNT(notiwr_no) as rprtCnt_r from rprt_list group by notiwr_no ) r on s.study_no = r.notiwr_no left join ( select notiwr_no, COUNT(notiwr_no) as rprtCnt_a from rprt_list where rprt_st = 'G4' group by notiwr_no ) a on s.study_no = a.notiwr_no ORDER BY reg_dt DESC

SELECT reg_dt, ttl, inq_cnt, '프로젝트모집게시판' as "postType", prjt_no as "no", id, rprtCnt_r as "rprtCnt", rprtCnt_a as "noneCnt" FROM prjt p left join ( select notiwr_no, COUNT(notiwr_no) as rprtCnt_r from rprt_list group by notiwr_no ) r on p.prjt_no = r.notiwr_no left join ( select notiwr_no, COUNT(notiwr_no) as rprtCnt_a from rprt_list where rprt_st = 'G4' group by notiwr_no ) a on p.prjt_no = a.notiwr_no ORDER BY reg_dt DESC

SELECT reg_dt, ttl, inq_cnt, qa_notiwr_no as "no", '취업Q&A게시판' as "postType", id, rprtCnt_r as "rprtCnt", rprtCnt_a as "noneCnt" FROM empl_qst e left join ( select notiwr_no, COUNT(notiwr_no) as rprtCnt_r from rprt_list group by notiwr_no ) r on e.qa_notiwr_no = r.notiwr_no left join ( select notiwr_no, COUNT(notiwr_no) as rprtCnt_a from rprt_list where rprt_st = 'G4' group by notiwr_no ) a on e.qa_notiwr_no = a.notiwr_no ORDER BY reg_dt DESC
